import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class About extends Component { render() { return (
Hey There!

Who Am I?

I'm a freshly minted software engineer right out of college, trying to learn more about the world. As the child of someone who owns more than 500 self-help books, I'm always trying to better myself. You can find me trying something new at any point, whether that's cultivating a new habit, trying a new recipe, or trying my best to meditate. Some things work and some don't. You can still keep trying though.

Recently, I've been trying to read and write more. If you want to talk more, feel free to email me.

What I do?

Here are things I like

Big Data

Having worked with Apache Spark and Hadoop, I enjoy building and maintaining scalable systems.

People

I'd like to debunk the myth that engineers are bad at communication. Let's talk!

Giving Back

Our relationship with Earth shouldn't be a story of unrequited love. We can try to do our part.

Dev Ops

Jenkins , Kubernetes , Docker

Graphic Design

My friend knows .. P

Digital Marketing

I use Instagram eight hours a day :)

) } }
